about_the_game:
1. Gameplay: There will be two teams to bet on in the game. Choose the team you think will win. After placing the bet, you can see the two sides start fighting until one of them wins. Through continuous betting and winning, you can accumulate money. If you reach the money target within a certain number of times, you will win. Of course, you can continue to bet until you are satisfied after reaching the target.

2. Game tips: Through observation and understanding of the warriors, you can make smarter decisions

3. Game features: You can see the battles of more than 100 warriors, with various types of warriors and different areas of expertise. It is possible that the previous game was mediocre and the next game is crucial to victory. Function

4. Competition rules: The competition is composed of two teams sending their own soldiers to fight each other. As long as all the soldiers of the other team are killed, they will win.

5. Betting rules: Choose the team that will win, and the betting amount is [10%] [30%] [60%] [100%].

The Jockey Club provides betting on the team you support. Use your shrewd vision to make more money!

name: Battle Investment Master
short_description: Two teams sent their own warriors to fight each other. The winner is the one who kills all the warriors of the other team. The Jockey Club provides betting on the team you support. Use your shrewd vision to earn more money!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
